    • comparePokerHands

      public ArrayList<String> comparePokerHands(PokerHand anotherPokerHand)
      method to find the winner between this hand and another
      Parameters:
      anotherPokerHand - the hand to compare to
      Returns:
      an arraylist of strings, the first field indicates who won or a tie (1,0,-1) and the second why the winner won (string of the combo, or the card)
